Lab example:
===

 11101100100000110101111001111001
100010100100001001010001010001001

11101100100000110101111001111001
11101100100000110101111010001001
11101100100000110110001010001001
11101100100000111010001010001001
11101100100001001010001010001001
11110100100001001010001010001001
100010100100001001010001010001001

                                 1000X0X0010000100X0X000X01000X001
11101100100000110101111001111001=100010100100001001010001010001001

Таким чином,

Y = x.L0 - x.L3 + x.L7 - x.L9 - x.L13 - x.L15 + x.L18 + x.L23 -
x.L26 - x.L28 + x.L32 = x.L0 + (x.L7 - x.L3)  - (x.L13 + x.L9) +
(x.L18 - x.L15) - (x.L26 - x.L23)  + (x.L32 - x.L28)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My constant: 5B3B070A (bin 01011011001110110000011100001010)

01011011001110110000011100001010
01100101010001010000100100001010

01011011001110110000011100001010
01011011001110110000100X00001010
010110110011110X0000100X00001010
0101101101000X0X0000100X00001010
0101110X01000X0X0000100X00001010
01100X0X01000X0X0000100X00001010
01100101010001010000100100001010

Таким чином,

Y = x.L1 + x.L3 - x.L8 + x.L11 - x.L16 - x.L18 + x.L22 - x.L24 - x.L26 + x.L29 + x.L30
  = (x.L1 + x.L3) + (x.L11 + x.L22) + (x.L29 + x.L30) - ((x.L8 + x.L16) + (x.L18 + x.L24) + x.L26)
